title: ğŸš€ SONIC & EgoScale: NVIDIA Robotics Open-Sources Humanoid Motion & Dexterous Manipulation Models

sources.author: DrJimFan
sources.text: What can half of GPT-1 do? We trained a 42M transformer called SONIC to control the body of a humanoid robot. It takes a remarkable amount of subconscious processing for us humans to squat, turn, craw

sources.author: DrJimFan
sources.text: We trained a humanoid with 22-DoF dexterous hands to assemble model cars, operate syringes, sort poker cards, fold/roll shirts, all learned primarily from 20,000+ hours of egocentric human video with

sources.author: DrJimFan
sources.text:
This is a huge team work at NVIDIA Robotics. Check out @ruijie_zheng12's deep dive: 

- Website: https://t.co/n3Zp8bh8Ht
- Paper: https://t.co/eXQqSl3GHg

https://t.co/ybup5DhSCM

key_facts: NVIDIA Robotics (led by Dr. Jim Fan) open-sourced SONIC â€” a 42M-parameter transformer that enables zero-shot transfer of diverse whole-body motions (squat, crawl, dance, teleop, audio-driven movement) to the real Unitree G1 robot with 100% success on 50 sequences.

Introduced 'EgoScale' â€” a scalable pre-training paradigm using 20,000+ hours of egocentric human video to learn dexterous manipulation (e.g., model car assembly, syringe operation, card sorting), achieving 54% gains over scratch training and enabling single-demo task learning.

Achieved unprecedented scale in humanoid RL: 100M+ mocap frames, 500K+ parallel robots in NVIDIA Isaac Lab (10,000Ã— physics acceleration), and demonstrated cross-hand generalization from 22-DoF Sharpa hands to 7-DoF Unitree G1 tri-finger hands.
SONIC integrates multimodal inputs (text, VR, webcam video, music audio, VLA models like GR00T N1.5) into one unified policy â€” marking a major step toward foundation-model-native robotics.
analyst_angle: This isnâ€™t just another open-source robot model â€” itâ€™s a paradigm shift: by treating human motion data as the universal reward signal and leveraging kinematic similarity as a free transfer mechanism, NVIDIA has bypassed decades of hand-engineered control and reward design, accelerating the path to general-purpose, deployable humanoid intelligence.
